title: TRESemme Expert Selection Beauty Full Volume Flexible Finish Hairspray 7.54 oz (Pack of 5)
description: When you've taken the time to create a beautiful bouncy style, there's nothing more annoying than watching it fall flat. TRESemme Beauty-Full Volume Flexible Finish Hairspray locks the bounce in your hair without stiffening your style. Weightless formulation with Fleximax Fixers helps hold your look, while keeping your hair's natural movement TRESemme Beauty-Full Volume Flexible Finish Hairspray helps maintain your bouncy style, without leaving hair feeling crisp or sticky Use as the final step in your volume regimen Prep hair with the TRESemme Beauty-Full Volume Reverse System Pre-Wash Conditioner and Shampoo, then style with the Volume and Softness Hair Maximizer or Touchable Bounce Mousse Spray over finished style from 10-12 inches away for long lasting hold
